item.title: Gurnett and Battacharjee - Chapter 2
item.description: \[\] 2.1 # Q Consider a plasma consisting of electrons and ions of equal number densities, \( n = n_e = n_i \), and temperatures \( T_e \) and \( T_i \). Assume that the electron density is determined by a term of a form \( e^{e \Phi / k T_e} \) and that the ion density is determined by a term of the form \( e^{- e \Phi / kT_i} \).
